definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: His father works at the weather station.
The weather station in the tower provides the information of the changing weather for the agriculture department.
sentences.chinese: 塔中的氣象站爲農業部門提供有關天氣變化的信息。

sentences.english: Most temperature-gathering weather stations are located in cities or towns.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數採集氣溫數據的氣象站都位於城鎮。

sentences.english: It straddles the 80th parallel and was created as a weather station in 1947.
sentences.chinese: 它橫跨北緯80度，於1947年作爲氣象站而建立。
